title: IMDB Explorer
description: A movie search application using the IMDB API. Allows users to search, sort, and view movie details.

title: Weather App
description: A weather forecasting app that shows current weather, temperature, and forecasts using OpenWeatherMap API.

title: Kanban Task Manager
description: A drag-and-drop Kanban board to manage tasks with local storage support.

title: E-Commerce Web App
description: A fully responsive e-commerce frontend with product listings, cart management, and modern UI styling.
